segments.text: Good morning . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning , I have an appointment with Mr . Wang Li .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But Could you tell me when he will be back ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am sorry , I don't know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: well , do you think I could leave a message for him ?
segments.speaker: S2
